question: The committee which was formed to defend the accused in Kakori Case was formed under the chairmanship of which of the following?
explanation: The committee which was formed to defend the accused in Kakori Case was formed under the chairmanship of Motilal Nehru. Members in the committee were Acharya Narendra Dev, Govind Ballabh Pant, Chandra Bhanu Gupta, Jawaharlal Nehru, Sriprakasha.
